title: Lubalin Ampersand
content:
Does anyone know the source of this ampersand? It shows up on google images, as the search for 'lubalin ampersand'. If it's custom - where did it originally appear?

Or if its a font, what is it?

thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013094834im_/http:/typophile.com/files/herb-ampersand_5470.jpg)
author: ppk812

comments.content:
This is obviously custom work by [Herb Lubalin](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013094834/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Herb_Lubalin). I don’t know where it originally appeared. I doubt this form has made it into a font. You might like the ampersand in Pistilli Roman, [recently revived as Eloquent](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013094834/http:/blog.fayeandco.com/2009/04/pistilli-realized/).  
F
